metadata.title: CVE-2023-52641 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:fs/ntfs3: Add NULL ptr dereference checking at the end ofattr_allocate_frame() It is preferable to exit through the out: labelbecause internal debugging functions are located there.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
